title: My Ex, We Meet Again
summary:
I once had a childhood friend who was an angel. However, when we met again, several years later, she had become a gyaru. 

A yuri story between two childhood friends.

title: Spoiled Fairytale
summary:
Late spring—on a street unusually damp and buzzing with life.
Seohee, worn out and withering under her parents’ contempt and neglect, finds herself entangled with a libertine infamous for his promiscuous private life.

“Ah. I didn’t really plan to go this far….”
“……”
“I’ll be spending the night.”

A man who freely crosses the line between kindness and cruelty.
A man who tosses around love carelessly.
A man who mocks fairytales, calling them hollow illusions—Joo Taebaek.

Wrapped in all things vivid and dazzling, he crashes into Seohee like a violent wave, shaking her to the core.

“Alright. I’ll keep your secret.”
“…Really?”
“In exchange, let me screw you—loud and wild.”

A filthy act of rebellion.
A fleeting moment of euphoria.

“No need to overthink it.”

She thought that if she assimilated with him, she might at least share in his counterfeit love.
So, she willingly threw herself into a fleeting flame.

Was she really insane? Who taught her how to seduce a man like him?

“Um… it’s over now, right?”

Seohee slightly lowered her head toward a completely dazed Taebaek.

“I have to go before midnight.”

So then—
Who really got swept up in the fire?

title: Her Majesty’s Night
summary:
The 17th Emperor, a woman, owes her throne to the Duke of Roark, who aided her ascent over her brothers. Though publicly revered, she harbors a secret liaison with the duke, her devoted supporter. 

Behind closed doors, she surrenders to him, shedding her regal facade. One fateful night, he breaches protocol, entering her chamber unbidden. Ignoring her protests, he asserts his desire, ravishing her despite her pleas. Authority crumbles in his presence as he claims her body, indifferent to her dignity. 

In his embrace, she is powerless, succumbing to his primal urges in a tumult of passion and betrayal.

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Urek Mazino
summary:
Before he became a legend, before the Tower trembled at his name—

Urek Mazino was just another Regular, climbing the Tower for a purpose greater than power: To chase after the enigmatic being, Phantaminum.

This is the untold story of Urek’s early days— his trials, battles, and relentless spirit as a chosen Regular. Witness the rise of the man who would one day shake the very foundations of the Tower itself. The legend of Urek Mazino begins here.

title: Dungeon Crawler Carl
summary: You know what’s worse than breaking up with your girlfriend? Getting stuck on a sadistic alien gameshow with her cat. Join Carl and Princess Donut as they try to survive the end of the world — or just get to the next level of a trap-filled fantasy dungeon.

title: Tiger Cub
summary:
The kid next door came back as an adult. What he is aiming for.. is my ♡♡..?!

Choi In-ho, the kid next door who took care of him when he was young, appears in the basement of this ordinary office worker. Due to In-ho's fraud (?), he suddenly ends up living in the basement.

Inho, who has been in love with the kid since his childhood, tries to seduce him, but fails once and for all..

What do we do to flirt with this dull brother?!

title: How to Survive as a Maid in a Horror Game
summary:
"How did you know? I hid it well so that no one would find out."
 
Adrian Caesar von de Paltzgraf, the successor to the Paltzgraf Family. He is hailed as an angel in this world, but only I knew that the serial murders and murder attempts happening in the area which everyone was talking about were all committed by a young, good-looking gentleman.

[Adrian's murderous intent has increased.]
[Convince Adrian to lower his murderous intent. If not, you die.]
[Adrian's murderous intent is at 92%.]

I am the only one who knows. I was the only one who transmigrated into the world of this ridiculous horror game.

---

Note:
- Only Ridibooks has all the volumes, due to Volume 1 of the side stories being R19.
- "No Exit Horror" is the English name on the ebook and physical Korean novel cover.

title: You Were the Only One Who Saw Through My Lie
Taming the Demon King
summary: He is the Demon King who was impeached. She is the brave hero who was laid off because of a failed expedition. Bound by destiny, the two of them embark on an adventure to repay their debts.

title: Your Instinctive Love
summary: Shin Yu-jin, a clumsy male friend with shaggy hair who only knew about studying. He, who was foolish, changes 180 degrees and shakes Kang-hee's heart. “I can’t watch you with other guys pretending to be friends anymore.” Her fluttering first love that started like that, Yoo-jin leaves in an unexpected accident, leaving Kang-hee with a trauma. Eight years later, Kang-hee became a homicide detective. She's been on an undercover job for a week and she meets a strange man in a hotel lounge. A face and coupling that resemble Eugene's. Confused by her confusion, Kanghee ruins his seat, and the two continue to get entangled due to an inevitability like a coincidence...

title: The Eldest Son of the Marquis House is a Martial Artist
summary: In a fantasy world in a novel, I am the only one using martial arts.

title: Shall We Get Married?
summary:
“Now... I’m going to divorce you.”

In-woo, who returned to Korea from England after six years, was greeted by his young wife’s notice of divorce. If that was what his wife wanted... In-woo writes the divorce papers as calmly as he did when he wrote the marriage papers. The last month they can spend together as a couple. He thought they would each organize their feelings that had piled up in their respective places as much as they had wished for so long…

"I promised before my father passed away that I would definitely be a helpful person to my brother."

She, Song Hae-in, is unnecessarily desperate, saying that she will do her best for the remaining time and that she will definitely repay the gratitude she has received so far.

"You are also at fault to this extent."

The two of them are meeting each other for the first time after a long time. Will their true feelings completely connect?

title: The Loser Is the First Lady
summary:
Louise is a noble lady who loves books and magic devices. One day, she suddenly had her fiancé stolen by the very same twin sister she was acting as. After her dream to be a magic device researcher was destroyed, the one to save her was her first love, the First Prince Lucius, whom she was able to meet again! From a book club in a secret library to outings to magic device shops, Louise manages to regain the light in her eyes with the time they spend together. With her feeling her heart beat from Lucius's sweet words, just when you'd think they'd get together in no time, the past that the 'substitute lady' doesn't want to be known becomes an obstacle. 

“What do you think about this?”
(No... I couldn't possibly tell him about that.)

On the other hand, Louise’s potential as a researcher is also starting to bloom...?

---
Louise, a noble lady who loves reading and researching magic tools, leads a double life pretending to be her twin sister. Suddenly one day, her fiancé breaks off their engagement and chooses to be with her sister instead. All seems lost to her when she also has to give up her dream of becoming a magic tool researcher, but a reunion with her first love, the first prince Lucius, saves her from her misery. As they spend time together reading books in the hidden archives and looking around at different magic tool shops, Louise slowly regains her confidence. On top of that, her heart flutters every time unconsciously sweet words leave the prince's mouth. The mood is perfect and it seems like it's seconds before they can finally be together, but the past she wants to keep hidden gets in the way.

"How...do you feel about me?"
(He asks, but... I can't do it. I can't tell him.)

Meanwhile, her potential as a researcher begins to blossom and leads to... A true love fantasy full of misunderstandings between a magic tool-obsessed noble lady and a stoic older prince awaits!

title: The Real Daughter, She Is an Almighty Boss
summary: A highly skilled fighter wakes up in someone else's body and discovers that she's the Huffmans' lost daughter Gemma, regarded as socially inferior to her adoptive sister and a human punching bag for her Aunt Elodie. Her father doesn't care about her. Her mother is ashamed of her. Just when everyone thinks Gemma is going to make a complete fool of herself, they get a slap in the face.

title: King of Violence
summary: First-year Gilsu Lee transfers schools to run from the bullying and violence. And the new place seems almost perfect. Everyone in his class is friendly and kind, and no one is bullying anybody. Violence? No, we don’t do anything like that in this school. That’s what the “Arena” is for. Don’t forget, Gilsu. What happens in the ring stays in the ring!

title: For Those of You For Whom Regret Is a Luxury
summary: Exploited by her brother, betrayed by her sister, and killed by her husband. So ended the tragic story of Ariana Lopez--until, at the moment of her death, she suddenly finds herself back in the past. Now that she has a chance to do it all over again, she enlists the help of Duke Dante Heigenberg, the most feared and desired man in the entire empire, to take revenge against her family and reclaim what’s rightfully hers. But strangely, the duke seems to want Ariana more than just for her extraordinary musical talent...

title: You Just Made My Day
summary:
At the mysterious orphanage where Sheena lives, death is nothing new to its residents—girls who no longer have families of their own, who are raised as weapons of war, taught to kill and take the lives of others without batting an eye. Everyone, that is, except Sheena, who wishes for nothing more than the growing conflict around her to end.

On the night of her roommate’s death, Sheena meets a strange girl covered in blood, who smiles despite the turmoil surrounding them. The next day, the girl appears as a new student in Sheena's class and introduces herself as Mimi. Initially thought to be a school myth, there are now whispers in the orphanage’s halls that Mimi is their secret weapon—an immortal who cannot die. 

When Mimi is later assigned as Sheena’s new roommate, Sheena’s world grows even more complicated when she begins living with someone who loves and welcomes death, when all Sheena wants to do is stop it… 

A story of two girls' innocent wishes, found in a world next to death.

title: Back to Chanbi
summary: Gyeono Kang, a lucky high schooler, used to enjoy the mutual love he shared with the prettiest girl in his class, Chanbi Baek. She was always all about him until an accident wiped her memories of the past year, and just like that, she no longer had feelings for him. But what about Gyeono, whose heart still beats for her? Is it even possible to win her back? Did she really like him back to begin with?! Somebody help!

title: I Was Mistaken for the Villain
summary: Haechan, who was too weak and ignored by everyone, meets the mysterious child Miro and gains great strength, but at the same time, he learns that the sealing stone that he thought would protect everyone was actually the main culprit that was destroying the world. He tries to fix this on his own, but those who do not know the truth see him as a villain.

title: The Prize of Youth
summary:
Prince of Destruction Zegard, destined to annihilate the world, arrives in a Japanese village with his maid Milky. An unforgiving massacre is about to begin...!?

---

[Part of the 10th anniversary Jump+ One-shot collection.](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2019/)

title: The Password Is 002
summary: Sujung finally makes up her mind to confess her feelings for Dojin, her classmate who she's had a crush on for 6 months. However, Dojin is unable to recognize Sujung on the street and passes by her. Shocked by this, Sujung is unable to go to class and runs off to the gym's storage. There, she meets Jaehyun, who promises to help Sujung and Dojin get closer... How? By making a grand scheme to seduce her crush with his younger brother!

title: Virus King
summary: When the apocalypse descends, the world transforms into a brutal game of evolution—humanity’s final trial, and the favorite playground of gods and demons. Brian Carter time-travels back to ten days before it all begins. Armed with foreknowledge and no time to waste, he injects himself with the zombie virus and awakens a legendary SSS ability: Virus Monarch! Now, with the power to command infection itself, Brian forges a terrifying new path through the chaos, one where he doesn’t just survive the end of the world, but rules it!

title: Possible to Date a Ranker?
summary:
Collections, in no particular order, of super short comics posted by author Hamita on Twitter/X and pixiv. The short story collections mainly include romcom and boy meets girl, but also include various genres such as scifi, gag, and suspense.

## Volume 1
1. An Imperfect Woman
2. Different Kind Of Different Kind
3. My Girlfriend Isn't Cute
4. Image Frequency
5. A Salesman Who Sells Greed
6. Maid Makeshift
7. A Goddess Without Inconvenience
8. One-Night-Only Passingman
9. Overhumankind's Planet

## Volume 2
10. Persistent Sports Girl
11. Misdelivered Love Letter
12. The Person Who Filled My Heart
13. A Beauty Soft And Fluffy In All Directions
14. The Apathetic Maid's Mismanagement
15. A Cold Senior And Warm Junior
16. The Ideal Cool Girl Who Is Only Kind To Herself
17. Duplicity And A Laughingstock
18. Robot And Landscape Painting

## Volume 3
19. The Soft-Spoken Conveni Clerk
20. A Girl Who Grasped A Secret
21. A Girlfriend Who Wants To Make Meals
22. I Want To Quit Being A Demon
23. A Bad Girl's Bag Inspection
24. Otherworldly Civilization
25. I Like Beauties Even With Bad Personalities
26. Counselor
27. The Transfer Student Ranked First In The Year
28. A Literature Girl Who's Kind To Geeks But Strict Only With Me

title: Oh, the Flower That Bloomed on the Wall
Your Highness i Decide My Fate
summary: Betrayed by her family and sentenced to die as an experiment, Phillie Lutner awakens the Tarot Cards of Fate, a Divine Relic with the power to rewrite time. Determined to reclaim her life, she uses their magic to escape her former fiancé, outsmart her scheming half-sister, and claim her rightful place as heir to the House of Lutner. But as she uncovers a dark plot surrounding the Relics, one question remains - can she break free from the past and build a future with those she loves, or is she doomed to repeat her tragic fate?

title: Onsaemiro
summary:
To prepare for her audition to cast in the upcoming historical drama, “Muyoung Tower,” would-be actress Haeri visits the Buyeo National Museum, where she finds the “gilt bronze incense burner,” an old Baekje artifact. Thanks to her, Onsaemiro, the son of a god who had been lying dormant in the incense burner, awakens, and the cycle of fate starts to move once again…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5083255), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=745472)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/xiangluqiyuan/list?title_no=1527)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/onsaemiro/list?title_no=2086)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/onsaemiro/list?title_no=3232)

title: One Hundred Thousand Years of Tribulation by Heavenly Thunder
summary:
After transmigrating into a cultivation world, young Fang Lingxiao rises to greatness with a talent that defies the heavens. In just a hundred years, he reaches the peak—the Great Ascension Stage. But during his final tribulation, the heavens unleash something unimaginable: a lightning storm that rages not for days or months, but for a hundred thousand years.

When he finally emerges from the ordeal, his cultivation is shattered—reduced to that of a mere mortal. Yet, his body, forged by countless years under divine lightning, has become indestructible.

Soon, Fang Lingxiao realizes the truth—this wasn’t fate. It was sabotage from a powerful figure in the Upper Realm.

Now, with his cultivation lost but an unbreakable body as his weapon, he sets out on a path of vengeance. He’ll uncover the traitor, climb the heavens once more, and make them all pay.

title: I Became The Black Swan Mother of The White Swan Princess
summary:
The transmigration that happened to others happened to me, too. I’m pretty sure I’m now a supporting character… but exactly which novel is this?

When I opened my eyes, I was a widow with stepdaughters my own age, and not only that, I turned into a black swan every night due to a dark curse! Holding back my tears, I decided to take charge of my fate…wait, why should I? Why So Serious?

A duchess during the day, a queen of the lake during the night – I have the best luck to be able to leisurely float around! Life should be lived unplanned! When I had just about decided to live my life like this, a white baby swan, one that was not in my no-plan life plan, came to me.

“Mommy, are you really my mommy?”

What, you were a person? And even the youngest sibling of the tyrant emperor?

“I’m not your mother! Can’t you tell by the different colors of our feathers?”

I’m a black swan, you’re a white swan! But why is she so crazy cute. Can our mother-daughter love endure the obsession and persecution of this child’s seven brothers, including the tyrant emperors?

title: Even though you know it’s crazy
The secrets of the lovely duchess
summary:
A collection of short stories from the pages of Sho-Comi!  
  
Story 1: Side Seat de Daite by Shinjo Mayu  
Mamii is in love with Sawaii, the person everyone considers to be a dork. When she confesses to him, he tells her he has conditions for dating her. What are the conditions? And is Sawaii the person she really thinks he is?  
  
Story 2: Brazen Lovers (3 chapters) by Mio Ayukawa  
Yuuna's mother moves them everytime she breaks up with a boyfriend. This new place is a real dump. Annoyed, Yuuna heads off to the beach where she meets a very sexy guy. Sou says "Lets always be together." but when Yuuna wakes up he's gone! Two people like this are bound to meet again…  
  
Story 3: Feel It, Roast Virgin by Kousaka Yuuka  
Rika is a virgin and is very nervous about her first night with her boyfriend Yuuya. It doesn't help that Yuuya tries to do it everywhere, outside, at school, he's ready! But will Rika be ready?  
  
Story 4: St. Gal Chick Valentine's Day by Ibuki Kaede  
Mika's school has separate buildings for boys and girls and the girls have asked Mika as a student representative to get them co-ed classrooms so they can spend Valentine's Day with school idol, Subaru. Mika vows to try her hardest, even though Subaru annoys her. But maybe he's not such a bad guy.  
  
Story 5: Secret Apple by Toda Megumi  
Sakura Kazuki and Katou Ryu are lovers who have been meeting secretly for two years. Because they were once step siblings, and their parents had a messy divorce, they can't tell anyone. Will they ever be able to love freely?  
  
Story 6: Double Face The Dangerous Classmate by Uchuuda Kai  
It seems Kuroda has been caught in yet another dangerous situation! The boy; whom she considers rudest in her class, Yuuki; has locked the door to the sport supply closet..

title: Whispers of the Devil
summary: Haruka Iijima and his teacher, Nakagami Sensei, are in the middle of a bitter-sweet relationship. Being a student and teacher couple isn't easy, but they're about to find out that's the least of their troubles. Nakagami Sensei's family, the gang of impossibly beautiful, age-defying Nakagami Sensei obsessed individuals might just turn out to be the worst nightmare. Will this love be able to survive the perverted mystery that is the Nakagami Clan?!

title: After the School Belle Dumped Me, I Became a Martial Arts God
Logging 10,000 Years into the Future
summary: At the beginning of the martial dao, abnormal beasts invaded the world. Humanity’s martials had to retreat in defeat time and time again. Lu Sheng transmigrates to that time, but in his dreams he enters a world 10 000 years later. The foundational body refining method from 10k years in the future is several thousand times more effective than the current one. Then there’s the breathing method, body refining pill formula, and sacred martial law from 10k years later… Despite developing martial arts for 10k years, humanity was annihilated! Their martial arts civilization reached the apex, and yet there was no one left to inherit it. Except Lu Sheng, he’s exactly that last spark of hope!

title: Astral Pet Store
summary:
In the era of astral pets, only the might of pets was essential! However, making the pets stronger has always been a slow and arduous process for pet warriors. That was until the appearance of a mysterious pet shop that changed everything!

The weakest skeleton could slay a great golden dragon with a single strike after training at this pet shop! Even the humble watchdog of the shop possessed ten legendary skills, and the female worker in the shop claimed to be a Goddess...

As for what the shopkeeper Su Ping thinks: I'm merely training these cute pets to become exceptional overlord beasts. What? Is it not normal?
- - -
In the era of beasts, pet strength determines everything! The battle pet master works hard and slowly to improve the strength of the pet. Until a mysterious pet store came out of nowhere!

In just a few days of cultivation, the lowly skeleton can kill the golden dragon with a single slash. Does the guard dog have ten secret skills of pet beats? The working girl even calls herself a god...

As for the owner, Su Ping: Isn't it a regular practice to breed cute pets into prehistoric king beasts?

title: The Baby Demon King Finds The hero Dads Way Too Annoying
summary: Reborn as a weak 4-year-old demon king, I tricked three heroes into becoming my "dads" to survive. But now they’re fighting over who gets to spend time with me! Even the male lead, meant for the heroine, is obsessed. What’s going on?!

title: Kissing Is a Violation of Contract
summary:
"Be my girlfriend."
Jae-hyun, a selfish tycoon, and Dan-bi, who has nothing but confidence to rely on.
They are entangled in a rainbow(?) relationship!
Will this 'contractual love affair' end safely?

title: A Corporate Underling Who Excels at Work
summary:
Chae Gyeong-jun, who gave up both college and his dreams due to the IMF crisis, once again faces despair in front of his grandmother's sudden hospitalization fees.

But then, a mysterious benefactor steps in to cover the hospital costs for his family...

"Who would provide support that doesn't help them at all, and why?"

In search of an answer, Gyeong-jun heads to Taeseong.

title: High School Gangsters
summary:
A high school turf war entangled with betrayal, revenge, and remnants of friendship!  

The fierce clash between Shin Woo-jae and Yang Seon-tae, former friends turned enemies, becomes an intense battle over revenge and truth.  

Amidst the hierarchy of high school dominance, friendship and vengeance emerge.  

Who will claim the throne in the end?

title: Fighting Ward
summary:
A high school student, Kang Sun-woo, single-handedly defeats a group of illegal loan sharks who came to his house. At the hospital, where he goes for treatment, he is invited by a mysterious man to participate in a suspicious fighting tournament with a huge cash prize.

The prize is crucial for the survival of his family. Sun-woo must survive the fight ward !

title: That’s Not What My Will Said
summary:
In a world where extraordinary powers called *" Beneïsons "* govern everything; only a boy named Kleis was granted the gift of the *" Seint Graal "*, a power whose use he could not even understand.

Despite this, he did not lose heart and formed a party with his childhood friend Hinoka, who possessed the beneïson of the *" Seint de l'Espee "*, to carry out guild missions. However, due to a minor misunderstanding and betrayal, his mind and body were shattered.

At the same time, Kleis' beneïson revealed its true potential. The *" Seint Graal "* was the pinnacle of power, capable of granting any beneïson in existence to himself or others.

Having lost everything, yet now holding the power to gain everything, what will he choose? The end of the world or something else?

title: Pretty Woman
summary:
At her brother Touma's wedding, Fuyuka Nishi falls in love with Akito, a handsome young man who is just her type. In order to win Akito's favor, Fuyuka tries to get some information on him from her brother, but Touma, who knows about Akito's bad reputation, is in denial and tries hard to undermine Fuyuka's infatuation towards Akito. He accidentally says the following: "Although Akito pretends to be tough, he is actually the type of guy who wants to be dominated by women without any limitations" (a lie). Without knowing it, Akito goes to the aquarium with Fuyuka for a date -...?

title: I Tamed the Enemy Prince
summary: After losing his life in an accident, Kazuma finds himself reincarnated as the Ascalon Empire's third prince, Ares.  He wasn't born with the "stigmata", the proof that one is royalty and gives them extraordinary abilities, however, he still received love from his family and spent his days in peace. Until one day, his father's first wife, Germa barged into their home, and looked at Ares in contempt for not having a stigmata. In the end, she even put his mother, Erina in danger. Realizing how powerless he truly was, Ares decided to protect his family with his own power. He decides to enroll into Ascalon Academy, a prestigious school where one's capability decides everything!
